item.title: Drain fully covers loose after being removed to clear drains, trip hazard, 26th May
item.description:
Pavement outside Morrisons Daily, North Street. The metal drain fully covers are loose and tipping inside the fully causing trip hazard
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 22-24, North Street, Winchcombe, Winchcombe
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Other damage to pavement i.e. cobbles, raised mound/surface

item.title: Drain cover broken and sunk, 26th May
item.description:
Church lands flat, gloucester street of the road almost opposite the Corner cupboard. Footpath drain cover broken and sunk into drain.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Gloucester Street, Winchcombe, Winchcombe, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Uneven slabs caused me to fall over outside of greggs, 26th May
item.description:
Along the pavement by card factory, tanning shop and greggs. Not happy at all as I am currently suffering with my back as it is and this situation has not helped at all.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 78, Edinburgh Place, St Mark's, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
